name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-graph-profile-awards
title: My Awards
shortDescription: This web part is using the beta MS Graph Profile endpoint to list your awards. At the time of writing this sample (May 2022), this is a Beta endpoint, so it could change in the future. A future version of this web part could include the ability to add new awards to your profile.
longDescription: This web part is using the beta MS Graph Profile endpoint to list your awards. At the time of writing this sample (May 2022), this is a Beta endpoint, so it could change in the future. A future version of this web part could include the ability to add new awards to your profile.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
